mail_body:
Dear Mr. Lucas,

I am writing to apply for the position of Junior Software Developer - Python at IBM, as advertised on Stepstone. With my experience as a Payroll Manager at KWS GmbH, where I consistently used Excel and various software on a daily basis, as well as my master’s degree in finance and payroll from Harvard University, I am well equipped with the technical skills necessary to excel in this role.

Throughout my career, I have honed important qualities such as being reliable, having an acute attention to detail, and being punctual which are essential traits required to succeed in a development role. As someone who always seeks to acquire new knowledge, I am confident that the Junior Software Developer position would provide me with an opportunity to continue my growth while also contributing to IBM's success.

In addition to my technical qualifications, I am a critical thinker with a strong determination to succeed. This is illustrated through my willingness to learn new coding processes and playing with computers as a hobby.

Thank you for considering my application. I believe my skills and experience would add value to the success of the team and IBM as a whole.

Sincerely,
Jude Smiley
